Title: Requires a mortgagor to provide notice of imminent foreclosure
Summary: Relates to requiring a mortgagor to provide notice of imminent foreclosure to his or her tenant or prospective tenant prior to he or she renewing or signing a lease agreement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring a mortgagor to provide notice of imminent foreclosure to his or her tenant or tenants
